name: Symfonia
description: '''Symfonia''' was a short-lived [[symphonic power metal]] [[Supergroup (music)|supergroup]] formed in 2010 by [[Andre Matos]] (vocals), [[Timo Tolkki]] (guitars), [[Jari Kainulainen]] (bass), [[Mikko HÃ¤rkin]] (keyboards) and [[Uli Kusch]] (drums). On February 18, 2011, the band made its debut performance at the Finnish Metal Expo. The band released its only album, ''[[In Paradisum (Symfonia album)|In Paradisum]],'' in March 2011.
